title: Fun to shop but glitchy
text: I find a lot of great things on here for great prices. However the app is very glitchy and will pretty much stop working if you have it open for too long.

title: Seller Review
text: I like the fact that when you sell an item you dont have to pay high fees like some of the other selling apps. The only dislike is that it takes forever to sell items and when someone favorites your item and you send an offer it is not binding. This means that most people either forget about their purchase or change their mind making this extra task a minimal return of invest for the time you have to put in.

title: Horrible Customer Service
text: The customer service is non existent and US shipping prices are more expensive than the Post Office. I used this app for years as a buyer and seller. Never again.

title: Customer service is nonexistent
text:
I hadn‚Äôt used the app in a couple of years, and my phone number and card number changed. I contacted them to try and get in to my account since they forced a 2 step authentication to my old number even with the correct credentials. They said that I needed to verify a Vinted purchase with my account which I could not go back that far to find, I sent them my debit card information, I even offered to send my ID and any other information to get access to my account - and they denied it. They said I had to either verify with my old phone number or old debit card! I got very generic repetitive responses and now my account is just unobtainable. 

Use Poshmark instead. Vinted is a joke.

title: Feedback
text: I really like Vinted and I use it quite frequently, but I believe there are some things that can be improved. I wish you had the option to organize your favorites into different sections, and I wish that you could sort by countries, so you are only looking at clothes from a specific country. lastly, I do not believe that you should be able to see how many stars someone gave you before you gave them stars because that can lead to someone being spiteful over a critique and giving a lower rating. Otherwise i really like vinted.

title: So happy with my dress !

title: Lack of communication
text: The lack of user support is horrible. All you get is automated messages and then you are ignored. Their artificial intelligence mistakes items for something they are not, such as a candle holder. You get a message in regards to your listening being deleted and prohibited, they send u a list of items that are ok to sell and it will list candle holder as an ok item. You appeal the decision and get yet another automatic response with a persons name on the bottom stating it‚Äôs a prohibited item. Totally disregarding the fact it‚Äôs a picture of candle holders, u state it‚Äôs a candle holder and then they call u a liar and delete it. The id verification is a scam. They ask you to up load your drivers license, they verify it with a confirmation message stating it‚Äôs successful . Then two weeks later they send you a message banding your ability to withdraw your money from your wallet due to not verifying your identity. You message them and they send you automatic reply stating you didn‚Äôt verify your identity correctly. If that‚Äôs the case then why send a confirmation message saying it‚Äôs successful. To me it seems like they are scamming people and selling the personal information on the black market if they are continuing to ask for your id and social security number. I used to love this app. Now I‚Äôm going to contact lifelock and make sure they aren‚Äôt stealing my identity. I suggest anyone else being told to constantly re-verify their identity do the same.

title: Costs are getting out of control
text: I‚Äôve used Vinted for years, and always loved it, but the platform is changing and it‚Äôs so bad now. The shipping costs are INSANE (they used to be $.99-$6.99, and now it costs $7 to mail a piece of jewelry, and $16 to mail anything over 2lbs?). The last two times I‚Äôve tried to buy a bundle, the sellers tell me I‚Äôm required to split my order into multiple bundles, which is the stupidest business model - why would anyone spend $50+ on shipping for a $20 order?

title: Needs a lot of work
text:
This team seems slow to update this app, it‚Äôs honest pretty garbage after using this app for 3 years+. 
Another person stated they sell on a lot of platforms and this is the worst selling app, I would also agree. 
This app is giving kindergarten, Poshmark & Mercari are giving more High School. Vinted just doesn‚Äôt seem interested in improving their app to be better which is sad. They‚Äôve adjusted shipping a couple of times and added a category or two but not enough to keep me interested. 

I really don‚Äôt like seeing 99+ notifications when it‚Äôs just a bunch of people uploading something that I don‚Äôt care about, apparently you can‚Äôt turn that feature off which is beyond annoying. I only want to see what‚Äôs going on with my store, not what everyone else is uploading. Why do you insist that this is a great feature to keep? 

I‚Äôd like to see more improvement from this app in 2024 however, I appears they spend only about 5 hours a year ‚Äúimproving‚Äù this app.

There is nothing there to read...

title: BEEARE!!!! Horrible customer service
text:
Hope you never have to change your phone number and need help from this company! I can log into my account, but they want to send a security code to an old phone number, which I no longer have, and in order for me to change my phone number they want for me to provide some security information. And that‚Äôs great however, the information that they want are things like what‚Äôs the date that you set up this account? WTH?. 
I have sent the approximate date I think is the account was set up 
my user ID 
my email address 
my date of birth 
A picture of my two credit cards with my name, the full account number and expiration dates,
 I have even given them the full old telephone number, which their site does not provide.  
It doesn‚Äôt make any sense to me that I can login and yet not be allowed in to change the phone number so I guess like everybody else on here, vented gets to keep all the money from the items that I sold because I never transferred any of it over to my bank account. What an incredibly rotten to the core company!

title: Oh what a good feeling
text: I got a sweet deal and it shipped fast and is exactly like described. A+ seller in my book.

title: Buyer Frustrations
text: As a buyer on this site, I'm ready to throw in the towel and stop using it. Most sellers on this app don't give measurements and ignore questions about the clothing you want to purchase. I just don't understand why a seller would ignore their customers. They throw a piece of clothing on their bed or floor, snap one photo of it and write no info about it. Obvious they're more interested in money than a satisfied happy customer. The most recent problem I've run into is after I purchase something, they never send it and Vinted has to cancel the order. Too lazy to even put their accounts on vacation mode. I'm over it.
